import React, {Component} from "react" import { Form, Col, Button } from "react-bootstrap" class Main extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { gender: 'male', exercise: 'ex-1', height: '', weight: '', age: '', resultedBMR: '' } this.onParametersChange = this.onParametersChange.bind(this) this.onCalculate = this.onCalculate.bind(this) } onParametersChange(event) { const target = event.target; const value = target.name === 'gender' ? target.checked : target.value; const name = target.name; this.setState({ [name]: value }); } onCalculate(event) { event.preventDefault(); let { gender, age, height, weight, exercise } = this.state, bmr = 0, bmrFinish = 0 if (age && height && weight !=='') { if (gender === 'male') { bmr = 10 * weight + 6.25 * height - 5 * age + 5 } else { bmr = 10 * weight + 6.25 * height - 5 * age - 161 } if (exercise === 'ex-1') { bmrFinish = bmr * 1.2 } if (exercise === 'ex-2') { bmrFinish = bmr * 1.375 } if (exercise === 'ex-3') { bmrFinish = bmr * 1.55 } if (exercise === 'ex-4') { bmrFinish = bmr * 1.725 } if (exercise === 'ex-5') { bmrFinish = bmr * 1.9 } } this.setState(Math.round({resultedBMR: bmrFinish})) } render(){ return (

Введите данные для расчета BMR

{/* */} {/* */}
Ежедневная норма килокалорий {this.state.resultedBMR}
) } } export default Main
